Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the interior is slightly ribbed and partially encrusted with a grey granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of five lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394974) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394974)
